Franz Liszt

Dem Andenken Petőfis, S. 195i

1877 · LW A279 · R. 111

[IMSLP]

Liszt used themes from his melodrama A holt költő szerelme (S. 349; LW P5; R. 657) in Dem Andenken Petőfis, which exists in a version for solo piano (S. 195i; LW A179; R. 111) and a version for piano duet (S. 614; LW B50; R.313). He later prepared a revised version (S. 195ii), before revising it further and including it as Petőfi Sándor in the Historische ungarische Bildnisse (S. 205; LW A335; R. 112).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 8 · Z. A/B 14503 · ed. Adrienne Kaczmarczyk / Ágnes Sas

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2.5
